Zookeeper

  1. Create Directory at /usr/local/zookeeper
  2. Download zookeeper from http://mirrors.sonic.net/apache/zookeeper/
  3. Untar zookeeper file and create symbolic link
  4. Create directories for ZooKeeper to store its snapshot and transaction log:
    • /usr/local/zookeeper/var/data
    • /usr/local/zookeeper/var/datalog
  5. Create current/conf/java.env

JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/jdk1.6
export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH

  1. Copy the sample ZooKeeper setting file, and make the following changes to set where ZooKeeper should store its data:

dataDir=/usr/local/zookeeper/var/data
dataLogDir=/usr/local/zookeeper/var/datalog
